name: Zacharie the Cat and the Flourishing Fish
name_original: Zacharie the Cat and the Flourishing Fish
description:
Zacharie is a space faring cat... who crash landed on an alien planet!? 

Zacharie should probably fix his ship, but first it's time to feast! Dive down and watch your breath as you collect fish from the ocean floor. Bring your haul back up to devour, but watch out for those pesky aliens swimming around!

(Please view the README.txt included for gameplay controls + instructions)

Why was this created? Danbolt and I created 256 x 256 tilesets... and swapped them with eachother! This is my half of the Flip Team game creation extravaganza... made entirely with Danbolt's Tileset. Be sure to checkout his page to see what he created with my Tileset! This was created over the course of 2 months (plus a little extra time for my half.) In an attempt to ship a complete product.
